about.title: Company Profile of PT Multiusaha Prioritas Bersama
about.history_p1: PT Multiusaha Prioritas Bersama was established on November 27, 2023, with the goal of building a resilient entrepreneurial ecosystem in Indonesia.
about.history_p2: As a holding company, we focus on building a resilient entrepreneurial ecosystem through various business lines, including education and training.
about.history_p3: We believe that with the right approach, every business potential can be accelerated effectively and sustainably.

strategy.title: Vision & Mission
strategy.vision_desc: To be the leading business training and mentoring institution in Indonesia that creates competent, mentally strong, and synergy-ready entrepreneurs.
strategy.mission_1: Organizing relevant and practical business training and coaching programs to produce human resources with capable skills and mentality.
strategy.mission_2: Equipping participants with the mindset and strategies needed to help Business Partners achieve maximum turnover.

testimonials.title: What Do MPB Group Clients & Partners Say?
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from clients and alumni of business units under MPB Group.

list.name: Robert Leonardo Tobing
list.content: As an owner, my biggest challenge was building a neat and scalable business system. Through programs under MPB Group, specifically Sekolah Mentor Indonesia (SMI), I obtained a clear and measurable operational system blueprint. The impact was immediately felt on our company's bottom line.

list.name: Irvan Kusuma Tardiyanto
list.content: MPB Group doesn't just talk theory. Through its education unit, SMI, I learned leadership and strategic mindsets that are truly applicable. Now my business decisions are much more data-driven and directed.

list.name: Rigel Pradiko
list.content: The greatest value of MPB Group is its structured mentoring approach. Access to mentors and the ecosystem under MPB Group helped me accelerate the decision-making process and business growth.
